title: Marvel Cinematic Universe - Phase 2 Omnibus
description:
This is a huge torrent file (even bigger than Phase 1).

I have compiled the Marvel Cinematic Universe and cut it into chronological order (using very good quality sound & video files).  I then split it into hour long episodes to make the viewing experience manageable.  It is a great way to watch the films as there are plenty of storylines that happen concurrently.

PHASE 2 Includes the complete films:
Iron Man 3
Thor: The Dark World
Captain America: The Winter Soldier
Guardians of the Galaxy
Ant Man
The Avengers: Age of Ultron

PHASE 2 also includes intercut scenes from:
Agents of SHIELD (season 1 & 2)
Daredevil (season 1)
Jessica Jones (season 1)

As I said, it is a very fun viewing experience and of course, everyone will have a different interpretation of how the MCU should go as far as chronology is concerned but this is a pretty meticulous cut.  There are some volume adjustments that need to be made as I couldn't quite match them completely but this shouldn't completely destroy the viewing experience.

I hope you enjoy all the hard work and can help me seed this for others.

I have completed MCU's Phase 1 & 3 (so far) and the X-Men Omnibus from Fox as well
